自從2020年(印象中)開始,官方只會不斷相關於殺手的下修,下修最有力防守的爆爆(圖騰:毀滅),原本要按完美較準才能修發電機的進度,現在就是要較準的部份取消,直接修就可以了,只有沒修機才200%倒退進度,不到3分鐘就沒有3台發電機,你該叫玩殺手怎玩,守屍不是,針對又不是,照顧新手不是這樣照顧的....我覺得變回舊爆爆(完美較準),才對所有殺手都玩的起來,我就是喜歡玩這類感覺,在找圖勝拆圖勝,不時無心跳殺手突然拉背,我是喜愛這遊玩恐怖感,話說,我真的不明白官方下修瘦電鋸的意義是怎樣,插件還比沒修過的垃圾,透逗阿?不上修好用的紅配及紫配就下修沒用的紅配及紫配?搞甚麼阿?總之這DBD逾玩逾沉悶,我不推薦

Ein Spiel das auch mal zu viert im CooP wahnsinnig viel Spaß macht, egal ob Solo als Killer oder Surv. Die Community ist größenteils positiv, jedoch hat man hier und da so wie in allen Spielen seine Ausnahmen. Die Grafik wurde gut überarbeitet und ist sehr nett anzusehen. Durch das nun ermöglichte Crossplay wurden lange Wartezeiten in der Lobby (als Killer) eliminiert. Auch das Matchmaking wurde gut verbessert.
이 아이디 주인 오빠입니다... 게임이 너무 재밌네요 다른 사람들도 했으면 좋겠어요 가격 좀만 내려주세요 ㅋㅋ

내가 성능 별로 안좋은 캐를 좋아하는것도 있긴 한데 이 게임의 경우엔 몇몇 살인마를 제외하고는 폐급성능을 가지고 있다고 밖에 말할 수 없다.
하면 할수록 맨날 봤던 셋팅에 맨날 하던 플레이를 하면서 이건 게임 특성상, 캐릭 성능상 이길 수 없는 판이라고 느낀게 한두번이 아님.
뭐 티배깅을 막기를 해 밸런스를 맞추기를 해
모션 패치때 티배깅의 느낌을 최대한 살려두려 노력했다는 대목에서부터 얘네는 살인마 편들어줄 생각은 없던거임

While this game's concept is nice, the atrocious balance, godawful optimization, and more make it a hard no of a reccomendaton. The devs have shown multiple times they value profit over game health, and in the most recent update released a DLC pack in an unfinished state. The blattant disregard for game health and lack of actions they've taken to improve the game make this a definiite not reccomend for now,

Игра только для ДОЛБАЁБОВ, асболютно инбалансный Ghost Face которого хер законтришь, так с ним караулить висящего легко, Маньяки ох, это вопще отдельная история, не умеешь играть, даже не открывай для себя мир маньяка, потому что если ты кемпер, клеймо пидор потому что это контрить просто невозможно когда у тебя тиммейты вдобавок на тебя х-у-й ложили, ах да, окна, препятствия(палеты), и так же PING, это просто пиздец, мало что если у тебя 100 мбит инет там (в моём случае 80-85 мбит) АБСОЛЮТНО НЕ ИГРАБИЛЬНО, тебя маньяк пробивает за 5 метров от окна, пробивает тебя через препятствие когда ты уже перелез, всё в общем так, как с танкистами, если ты пидорас, игра для тебя.
Много игроков играющих с запрещёнными модами, жестокий сюжет, скучно, однообразно, магазин обновляется в храме тай очень долго( 4 перка на неделю)

У DBD много роблем: агро комьюнити , дерьмовый баланс , БАГИ , херовые сервера - с чего можно зделать вывод што эта игра кусок ебаного дерьма , но досих пор лучая в своём жанре . И я наиграл в неё 50 часов.

UPDATE:  The devs seem to hate people who play killer and they're not shy about it.  Everything that gives a slight advantage gets nerfed 1 update later.  It's getting much harder to have fun with this game and players are toxic AF.

I only play killer so this is gonna be a one sided review,

Lots of killers to choose from for everyone's individual play style.  Do some research before buying any killers, watch some videos, get to know how they play and choose one that fit's your play style.  Also, get this while it's on sale.  Otherwise, if you're like me and want all the killers, it gets expensive FAST.  Lastly, the game is from 2016.  Don't expect 4K resolution textures.  It's not ugly IMO...Minecraft was ugly...it's just 4 years old (at the time of writing this).

Bottom line: This is tons of fun.  Get some good headphones (mine are in the $120 range), turn out the lights and go to town scaring the pants off of the other players.  Oh, and a monitor that you can adjust the brightness on isn't a bad idea.  Mine is an LED TV with a "game" setting that makes things a LOT more visible for the killer.  Some people complain about that but IMO, that's like complaining about someone using better hardware or having the game run at more than 30 FPS.  Boo Hoo.  Now get on that hook and die, you dirty, generator touching survivor.

Es un juego bastante bueno, terror clasico y puro. Muy bien optimizado, graficamente exelente.. buen sonido y  sistema de juego bastante creativo "Survival y Killer" , todo bien traducido y buenos tutoriales.

LO MALO: los mapas son aleatoreos y la mayoria los tenes que comprar (aunque de oferta salen unos chelines) 
tambien hay que comprar personajes tanto como survivals y killers (aunque tambien se pueden comprar "algunos con plata del juego")

hasta ahora el juego me gusta mucho y lo recomiendo bastante para los amantes de los survival horror
Muito bom para jogar com os amigos. :)

Если честно игра хорошая командная и веселая,хорошие перки которые усложняет или облегчает все действия в матче.О минусах:много багов,вылеты и безсмыссленые баны за как бы ошибки игры,плохой античит (но читеров стало мало),много токсиков.О плюсах игры:крутая графика,есть поддержка от Nvidia freestyle тем можно свободно играть,полезные перки,бонусы подношений для блудпоинтов,и самое главное для выживших командная работа.Лучше играть вместе с друзьми.Вывод:игра крутая но надо пофиксить баги

好
Despite the occasional incredibly serious patch bugs, and the sporadic toxic players this is an incredibly fun non-symmetrical pvp game.

(35 Hours) I have to re-download the game every time i want to play it because i keep getting errors kicking me out of the game telling me "the game files have changed" newsflash: i never touched the game files, stop breaking the game when you update it.
 
Also the matchmaking is shit, good luck finding matches as a new player cause youre mostly going to get sweatlord 4 man groups of survivors that are high rank with maxed out perks bullying you; a level 7 account trying out wraith for the first time, they all use petrified oak so hooks are nonexistent and shine flashlights at you so you cant even see them, let alone hit them.

only good thing i have to say is play it with friends and you wont have much of a problem.

(700 Hours) After learning how to play the game somewhat properly it seems that trying to win with everything you have as a killer is seen as toxic while doing the same as survivor is seen as the norm.

Constantly have survivor teams rushing their objective so you cant get enough hooks by the time they finish them all? try tunneling, getting rid of one survivor by focusing them every time they are unhooked. You will be ridiculed and called a shit killer for "relying on something so toxic" yet survivors can bring all meta perks, bring  the best items and addons for them, and send you to the worst map in the game for killers, they will t-bag and point at you, rapidly click their flashlights and still feel as though you are the toxic player for tunneling them.

on the other hand, i tend to try not to tunnel, except i feel even worse doing that because whenever i leave survivors alive they are very toxic about escaping, not all survivors are sore losers but the ones who are definitely stand out to me more. I wonder why they ridicule killers when they win, if they keep telling killers they suck, eventually everyone who didnt quit the game is going to stop caring about being nice, and let me tell you, if a killer is good at the game and they TRULY try, you have no chance at winning if youre a solo survivor, why would you ever want all killers to tryhard in every match? 

Should i be nice and just accept a kill or two in the name of having fun in a videogame?
Or should i try my best to win often and get better at the game so i can play a little more calmy knowing i have the knowledge to win any time i choose?
Either way youll find salty survivors to tell you you suck. 

After also playing survivor for a while ive come to the conclusion that its very easy to get angry when you want to play the game but the killer tunnels you and takes you out faster than it took you find a match. 
Being tunneled often and cant stay in the game for long? use meta perks to artificially up your game, then realize it doesnt matter if you decisive strike the killer because hes actually GOOD and will down you again 10 seconds later. 

Killers who truly dont care about the "survivor handbook" will show no mercy and you will lose for sure, youd have to be in a 4 man team with communications to be able to deal with that. 

All in all, i would like the matchmaking to find people closer to my level, i find that being rank 1/2 on killer all the time has be playing with the best, 2-3 thousand hour players and im just not there, i have to tryhard to get a kill or two and its draining to have to deal with toxic survivors every match, so many groups of friends playing together in the name of "having a good time" but it comes at the killers expense, if we let them live after they t-bag, click, and point at us when we messed up in some way, they call us shit, but when we play the game right and kill them, whether we tunneled or not they will still say "tunneling killer is bad, hurr durr" so salty survivors be salty.

(1300 hours) There is no fun. since the MMR introduction the only thing you see is sweat from both sides, toxic seal team 6 squad survivors and tunneling, camping killers. Only the most powerful 4-5 perks and no variances in playstyle whatsoever. Its exhausting as killer to have to play 4D chess for every match just to get one kill unless you become a meta slave and its extremely frustrating to sit in queue for 5-10 minutes as survivor only to get tunneled and/or camped out of the game in 2 because you wanted to try a fun new build with those new perks you just got. The devs clearly have no interest in balancing the game to make it more fun even though they claim the game is supposed to be fun instead of competitive, otherwise they would lessen the gap between the op perks and the absolutely useless ones. Theres almost 200 perks in the game between both sides, why do i only ever see 10 of them?

If they actually would listen to their players perhaps this game would be better and somewhat more fun.  I would not spend $20 on this, if you want this game. catch it while its on sale.
